name: Mouse About TV
description:
Mouse About is a super fun, fast paced puzzler where all the puzzles are randomly generated, so nothing is ever predictable!

Each puzzle is played against a timer, so be quick or you'll lose a life.

Help Marv eat lots of yummy food. Solve all the food puzzles by guiding Marv the hungry mouse from one piece of food to another. Eat all the food to progress to the next level.

Thanks for playing!
